post-update-cmd: if [ -f vendor/zhengyou/phalcon-framework ]; then  rm -rf system; mv vendor/zhengyou/phalcon-framework system; fi
post-package-install: if [ -f vendor/zhengyou/phalcon-framework ]; then  rm -rf system; mv vendor/zhengyou/phalcon-framework system; fi
post-install-cmd: if [ -f vendor/zhengyou/phalcon-framework ]; then  rm -rf system; mv vendor/zhengyou/phalcon-framework system; fi
